verses.verse: To every<WH3605> thing there is a season,<WH2165> and a time<WH6256> to every<WH3605> purpose<WH2656> under<WH8478> the heaven:<WH8064>
A time<WH6256> to be born,<WH3205> and a time<WH6256> to die;<WH4191> a time<WH6256> to plant,<WH5193> and a time<WH6256> to pluck<WH6131> up that which is planted;<WH5193>
A time<WH6256> to kill,<WH2026> and a time<WH6256> to heal;<WH7495> a time<WH6256> to break<WH6555> down, and a time<WH6256> to build<WH1129> up;
A time<WH6256> to weep,<WH1058> and a time<WH6256> to laugh;<WH7832> a time<WH6256> to mourn,<WH5594> and a time<WH6256> to dance;<WH7540>

A time<WH6256> to cast<WH7993> away stones,<WH68> and a time<WH6256> to gather<WH3664> stones<WH68> together; a time<WH6256> to embrace,<WH2263> and a time<WH6256> to refrain<WH7368> from embracing;<WH2263>
A time<WH6256> to get,<WH1245> and a time<WH6256> to lose;<WH6> a time<WH6256> to keep,<WH8104> and a time<WH6256> to cast<WH7993> away;
A time<WH6256> to rend,<WH7167> and a time<WH6256> to sew;<WH8609> a time<WH6256> to keep silence,<WH2814> and a time<WH6256> to speak;<WH1696>
A time<WH6256> to love,<WH157> and a time<WH6256> to hate;<WH8130> a time<WH6256> of war,<WH4421> and a time<WH6256> of peace.<WH7965>
What<WH4100> profit<WH3504> has he that works<WH6213> in that wherein<WH834> he labors?<WH6001>
I have seen<WH7200> the travail,<WH6045> which<WH834> God<WH430> has given<WH5414> to the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> to be exercised<WH6031> in it.

He has made<WH6213> every<WH3605> thing beautiful<WH3303> in his time:<WH6256> also<WH1571> he has set<WH5414> the world<WH5769> in their heart,<WH3820> so that no<WH1097> man<WH120> can find<WH4672> out the work<WH4639> that God<WH430> makes<WH6213> from the beginning<WH7218> to the end.<WH5490>
I know<WH3045> that there is no<WH369> good<WH2896> in them, but for a man to rejoice,<WH8055> and to do<WH6213> good<WH2896> in his life.<WH2416>
And also<WH1571> that every<WH3605> man<WH120> should eat<WH398> and drink,<WH8354> and enjoy<WH7200> the good<WH2896> of all<WH3605> his labor,<WH5999> it is the gift<WH4991> of God.<WH430>

I know<WH3045> that, whatever<WH3605> <WH834> God<WH430> does,<WH6213> it shall be for ever:<WH5769> nothing<WH369> can be put<WH3254> to it, nor<WH369> any thing taken<WH1639> from it: and God<WH430> does<WH6213> it, that men should fear<WH3372> before<WH6440> him.
That which has been<WH1961> is now;<WH3528> and that which<WH834> is to be has already<WH3528> been;<WH1961> and God<WH430> requires<WH1245> that which is past.<WH7291>

And moreover<WH5750> I saw<WH7200> under<WH8478> the sun<WH8121> the place<WH4725> of judgment,<WH4941> that wickedness<WH7562> was there;<WH8033> and the place<WH4725> of righteousness,<WH6664> that iniquity<WH7562> was there.<WH8033>

I said<WH559> in my heart,<WH3820> God<WH430> shall judge<WH8199> the righteous<WH6662> and the wicked:<WH7563> for there is a time<WH6256> there<WH8033> for every<WH3605> purpose<WH2656> and for every<WH3605> work.<WH4639>

I said<WH559> in my heart<WH3820> concerning<WH5921> the estate<WH1700> of the sons<WH1121> of men,<WH120> that God<WH430> might manifest<WH1305> them, and that they might see<WH7200> that they themselves<WH1992> are beasts.<WH929>

For that which befalls<WH4745> the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120> befalls<WH4745> beasts;<WH929> even one<WH2088> thing befalls<WH4745> them: as the one<WH2088> dies,<WH4194> so<WH3651> dies<WH4194> the other;<WH2088> yes, they have all<WH3605> one<WH259> breath;<WH7307> so that a man<WH120> has no<WH369> preeminence<WH4195> above<WH4480> a beast:<WH929> for all<WH3605> is vanity.<WH1892>
All<WH3605> go<WH1980> to one<WH259> place;<WH4725> all<WH3605> are of the dust,<WH6083> and all<WH3605> turn<WH7725> to dust<WH6083> again.<WH7725>

Who<WH4310> knows<WH3045> the spirit<WH7307> of man<WH1121> <WH120> that goes<WH5927> upward,<WH4605> and the spirit<WH7307> of the beast<WH929> that goes<WH3381> downward<WH4295> to the earth?<WH776>

Why I perceive<WH7200> that there is nothing<WH369> better,<WH2896> than that a man<WH120> should rejoice<WH8055> in his own works;<WH4639> for that is his portion:<WH2506> for who<WH4310> shall bring<WH935> him to see<WH7200> what<WH4100> shall be after<WH310> him?
